source_note: State baseline derived from Alaska DEC Solid Waste Program and local municipal recycling guides; local rules may vary.

organics.guidance: Composting of yard and food waste is encouraged but not required statewide; regulated under DEC solid waste permits for larger sites.
organics.bin: Green or compost drop-off bin where available.
organics.notes: Limited curbside composting; backyard composting allowed without permit.

paper_cardboard.guidance: Recycle clean, dry paper and cardboard; flatten boxes.
paper_cardboard.bin: Blue or mixed recycling bin or drop-off center.
provenance: Fairbanks North Star Borough recycling info

glass_containers.guidance: Glass accepted in some communities; rinse bottles and jars.
glass_containers.bin: Drop-off or designated glass bin if available.
glass_containers.notes: Many areas do not collect glass curbside due to transport cost.

metal_containers.guidance: Recycle aluminum and steel cans, clean and empty.
metal_containers.notes: No aerosol cans or large scrap metal.

plastics.guidance: Recycle plastic bottles and jugs (#1–#2) where accepted.
plastics.bin: Blue bin or drop-off (loose, not bagged).
plastics.notes: Plastic bags, film, and foam not accepted in curbside bins.

beverage_containers_crv.guidance: Alaska has a 5¢ refundable deposit on eligible beverage containers (Alaska Bottle Bill).
beverage_containers_crv.bin: Return to BottleDrop or redemption center.
beverage_containers_crv.notes: Applies to most aluminum, glass, and plastic drink containers.

household_batteries.guidance: Recycle rechargeable batteries; drop-offs at HHW events or collection sites.
household_batteries.bin: Take to hazardous waste facility or recycling drop-off.
household_batteries.notes: Keep batteries out of curbside bins.

e_waste.guidance: Electronics recycling through local collection events or facilities; no statewide mandate.
e_waste.bin: Drop-off at e-waste collection or landfill reuse area.

plastic_bags_and_film.guidance: Plastic bags and film not accepted in curbside recycling.
plastic_bags_and_film.bin: Return to retail drop-off if available.
plastic_bags_and_film.notes: Some municipalities restrict single-use plastic bags.

bulky_items.guidance: Large items require special pickup or landfill drop-off.
bulky_items.notes: Fees may apply for furniture, appliances, or mattresses.
provenance: Local borough landfill and SWS guidance
